name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
directions: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F.
Sift together the flour, baking soda and salt.
In a medium bowl, cream together the melted butter, brown sugar and white sugar until well blended.
Bake for 15 to 17 minutes in the preheated oven.

name: Strawberry Shortcake
directions: Slice the strawberries and toss them with 1/2 cup of white sugar.
Bake for 15 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden brown.

name: Vanilla Ice Cream
directions: In a medium bowl, whisk together cream, milk, sugar, and vanilla.
Pour mixture into ice cream maker and churn according to manufacturer’s instructions.

name: Lemon Bars
directions: Bake for 20 to 25 minutes in the preheated oven, until golden.

name: Blueberry Muffins
directions: Combine flour, sugar, salt and baking powder.
Place vegetable oil into a 1 cup measuring cup; add the egg and enough milk to fill the cup.
Bake for about 20-25 minutes in the preheated oven, or until done.
